response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and it represents a significant investment for me. I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $900,000. I believe this offer presents a favorable balance between the intrinsic value of the product and your willingness to pay, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 900000}
